name: Canyon Run (Chris Ashtear)
description:
This is a remake of the 70's arcade game Canyon Bomber.

You control the Red Plane. Use spacebar to drop a bomb and blow up the rocks. If you do not drop a bomb during a run, it counts as a miss. 3 misses and its game over.

7/8:Fixed bug with ai shooting when it wasnt supposed to & issue with planes not moving to next pass.

Killer music from mod archive - the Flying Dutchman:
https://modarchive.org/index.php?request=view_by_moduleid&query=124892
